title: Challenge 10: Photoresistor Sensor
description: Read the value from a photoresistor sensor.
codeSolution:
import machine
import time

adc = machine.ADC(0)

while True:
    light_value = adc.read()
    print('Light value:', light_value)
    time.sleep(1)
